tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The reason for this is that the prophet appears to his contemporaries as ‘a person just like themselves’. They find it surprising that one whom they have always treated as their equal should suddenly become great and start advising them
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: He will see a glimpse of the other world (the Hereafter) in this world, because, in fact, the world of the Hereafter is essentially another, more superior form of the present world
distractors: This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse narrates a historical event

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: A part of the punishment the rejecters of Truth are destined to receive in the Hereafter is shown here in this world of today. The destruction of these peoples is, in fact, a sample of the conditions in the Hereafter
distractors: This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Qaf, Ayah 16?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: All these are known facts of today, and these known facts are what make the Quran’s claim credible that man’s intentions, his utterances and his actions, are all in the knowledge of his Creator
distractors: This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Qaf, Ayah 19?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: A picture of death and Doomsday thereafter has been drawn in these verses. It shows what will happen to those who, finding themselves free in this world, became arrogant
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Fear of God creates heavenly attributes in man, while a lack of fear creates the attributes of Hell. They are the people who, in this world, went in constant fear of God’s punishment
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Qaf, Ayah 36?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Nations of the world progress and rise until they reach their zenith. There are great lessons in these events of history
distractors: This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse narrates a historical event
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Qaf, Ayah 38?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The creation of the heavens and the earth in six days, in other words in six stages, indicates that God’s method of doing things is a gradual one. In the Bible it is mentioned that God created heaven and earth in six days and rested on the seventh day
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: After the blowing of the trumpet, the shape of heaven and earth will undergo a drastic change and all human beings will be assembled in a new world in order to receive eternal awards, such as befit their respective deeds
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Qaf, Ayah 45?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: On the other hand, it has been stated in the Quran on more than one occasion that, through him, the Prophet Muhammad, God would cause the religion of Truth to prevail over all other religions
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse narrates a historical event
